availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Ramsey (Bath County, Kentucky, dry goods clerk)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, dry goods clerk. Kentucky native. Son of William W. Ramsey and Martha Ramsey. Student in Bath County in 1850. Dry goods clerk in Bath County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Division 2, p. 1B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bath County, Owingsville, p. 1.
Find A Grave, "John A. Ramsey (1844-1910)," Memorial #45130047, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/45130047(accessed July 28, 2020).
